channel.title: Logging into MY OWN server crashes it--please help
channel.description:
This is getting stupid, ive asked several times on here and no one helps. Whenever i log into my server one of the following happens:
-Takes 10 mins to log in (connection lost, loading please wait etc) then will "lag out" 2 seconds later.
-Logs in fine(ish) then when someone logs in it will crash instantly or a little while later.
During logging in, the client, windscape or moparscape will "not respond" several times.
I heared somthing about port forwarding and looked it up on wikipedia but, well it didnt help. Someone please help because learning how to make a server and code has consumed a lot of time, so if i cant host my server that time has been wasted.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 19, 2006, 01:39:17 PM[/size][hr]why wont ne1 help

did that to me put after like about 3 days it went lol

item.title: Logging into MY OWN server crashes it--please help
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

Are you running the client with a batch file (*.bat)? If not then that’s your cause. If you just double click the .jar file it will not login right.

Read full topic
